text: Benoît Jacques Joseph Gratton (born December 28, 1976) is a Canadian former professional ice hockey forward who played in the National Hockey League (NHL). He is currently the head coach for Jonquière Marquis of the Ligue Nord- Américaine de Hockey (LNAH). ==Career statistics== Regular season Playoffs Season Team League GP G A Pts PIM GP G A Pts PIM
